How Cuvio Works

Three simple steps to transform your meal planning

Receive personalized weekly meal plans with recipes, shopping lists, and prep instructions.

Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions about Cuvio

How does Cuvio's AI meal planner work?

Cuvio uses advanced AI to analyze your ingredients, preferences, and goals to generate personalized meal plans in under 2 minutes. Our AI considers seasonal produce, your location, budget, and household size.

Can I use ingredients I already have?

Yes! Cuvio's Leftovers Mode creates recipes from ingredients you already have. Take a photo of your fridge or input what's available, and our AI will suggest delicious meals to use them up.

Does Cuvio work for dietary restrictions?

Absolutely! Cuvio accommodates all dietary restrictions including vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, keto, paleo, and many others. Our AI learns your preferences and suggests appropriate alternatives.

Is Cuvio free to use?

Cuvio offers a free 3-day trial with no commitment. After the trial, you can choose from our affordable subscription plans or cancel anytime.
